simulator
Class VSMenuItemStates

java.lang.Object
  simulator.VSMenuItemStates

public class VSMenuItemStates
extends java.lang.Object

The class VSMenuItemStates. Used by the VSSimulator to update the "simulator" bar of the VSSimulatorFrame.

Author:
Paul C. Buetow
